Label: Description
Value: This dataset contains Food Prices data for India, sourced from the World Food Programme Price Database. The World Food Programme Price Database covers foods such as maize, rice, beans, fish, and sugar for 98 countries and some 3000 markets. It is updated weekly but contains to a large extent monthly data. The data goes back as far as 1992 for a few countries, although many countries started reporting from 2003 or thereafter.

Label: Source
Value: DEPARTMENT OF CONSUMER AFFAIRS, FPMA, Food and Public Distribution, Government of India, Ministry of Consumer Affairs, Ministry of Consumer Affairs via FAO: GIEWS

Label: License
Value: Creative Commons Attribution for Intergovernmental Organisations

Label: Caveats/Comments
Value: Although the frequency of updates is set to every month, updates may occur more or less frequently

Label: Tags
Value: economics, food security, hxl, indicators, markets
